title: Person of Interest Season 3 Finale - To quote Benjamin Franklin...
author: YT.POI
comment: Hersh went out like a fucking boss! I wouldn't expect less from the the man who trained Shaw.
What an episode it was! Collier and Hersh were killed and Finch was shot in less than a minute. No one's safe on this show and I felt really sorry for Vigilance :(

"I can get it!"

Hersh earned his stripes here.  Had he not had any interference he would've disarmed the bomb. He had one more wire.  SMH
Hersh went down like a badass, he was truly a man for the job
description:
PERSON OF INTEREST
''Deus Ex Machina'' Season 3, Episode 23
